dragosmg commented on PR #12980:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12980#issuecomment-1108522752

   I read these [2 rows: (202 & 203)](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/3ebc34411a7cb937b6ee9bf799e087b04bf46926/.github/workflows/r.yml#L202-L203) as: "we don't necessarily need to update them", since changing [row 206](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/3ebc34411a7cb937b6ee9bf799e087b04bf46926/.github/workflows/r.yml#L206) to `r-version: "4.2"`, implies changing [row 207](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/3ebc34411a7cb937b6ee9bf799e087b04bf46926/.github/workflows/r.yml#L207) to `rtools-version : 42`. Rows 202-203 state we need `rtools40`

dragosmg commented on PR #12980:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12980#issuecomment-1108714708

   Do we need to add something [here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/555b4d27192eb3f04cb68a53abea91d55fe27152/.github/workflows/r.yml#L179) to run `rtools: 42` against different runtime environments* (?).
   
   *I'm not quite sure that's what `'mingw32'`, `'mingw64'`, and `'ucrt64'` are.

assignUser commented on PR #12980:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12980#issuecomment-1108858089

   I am not sure but would guess yes? 
   Those are the different windows targets rtools can build for:
   - 32-bit
   - 64-bit
   - 64-bit for the new [Windows Universal C Runtime](https://github.com/r-windows/docs/blob/master/ucrt.md) which makes proper use of UTF-8 possible (-> better support for non-ASCII chars)

fields.description:
Now that R 4.2 is released, we should bump all of our R versions where we have ones hardcoded.

This will mean dropping support for 3.4 entirely and adding in 4.0 to https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/c4b646e715d155c1f77d34804796864465caa97b/dev/tasks/r/github.linux.versions.yml#L34

There are a few other places that we have hard-coded versions (we might need to wait a few days for these to catch up):

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/c4b646e715d155c1f77d34804796864465caa97b/dev/tasks/tasks.yml#L1291-L1295
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/c4b646e715d155c1f77d34804796864465caa97b/.github/workflows/r.yml#L60 (and a few other places in that file — though one note: we build an old version of windows that uses rtools35 in the GHA CI so that we catch when we break that — we'll want to keep that!)
fields.summary: [R] [CI] Bump versions with the release of 4.2
